params.partToWithdraw: percentage of token to withdraw in base points

params.tokenId: ID of the token to withdraw
params.tokenOut: address of the token to withdraw

withdrawUniNft(uint256,uint256).notice: remove uniswap position NFT to the position manager

zapOutUniNft(uint256,address).notice: remove a position from positionmanager zapping out

userdoc.notice: WithdrawRecipes allows user to withdraw positions from PositionManager
